        public Long createFile(EstherFile file)
        Creates a new file in both the database and in the local file system.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be created.
        Returns:
        The ID of the created file. Null if file creation failed.

      • getFileById

        public EstherFile getFileById(Long id)
        Retrieves the file information from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the coveted file.
        Returns:
        The file with he specified ID. Null if no such file is found.

      • getAllFiles

        public List<EstherFile> getAllFiles()
        Retrieve all the files in the database.
        Returns:
        List of all file entries in the database.

      • getPublicRootFiles

        public List<EstherFile> getPublicRootFiles(UserInformation user)
        Returns all the root files that are public.
        Parameters:
        user - The preferences of the logged in user.
        Returns:
        List of all files that meet the criteria:
        Every file must be publicly accessible.
        Every file must be a root file with no parents.
        Only files of different users are listed unless user preferences state otherwise.

      • getRootFilesOwnedBy

        public List<EstherFile> getRootFilesOwnedBy(Long ownerId)
        Returns all root files owned by the specified user.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - The ID of the user whose files are coveted.
        Returns:
        List of all files that meet the criteria:
        Every file must be owned by the specified user.
        Every file must a root file with no parents.

      • getAllSubfiles

        public List<EstherFile> getAllSubfiles(EstherFile parent)
        Returns all subfiles of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent file whose subfiles are to be listed.
        Returns:
        List of all subfiles of the specified file.

      • getPublicSubfiles

        public List<EstherFile> getPublicSubfiles(EstherFile parent,
                                 UserInformation user)
        Returns list of all subfiles that are public.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent file whose subfiles are to be listed.
        user - The preferences of the logged in user.
        Returns:
        List of all files that meet the criteria:
        Every file must be publicly available.
        Every file must be child of the specified parent file.
        Only files of different users are listed unless user preferences state otherwise.

      • getSubfilesOwnedBy

        public List<EstherFile> getSubfilesOwnedBy(EstherFile parent,
                                  Long ownerId)
        Returns all subfiles owned by the specified user.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent file whose subfiles are to be listed.
        ownerId - The ID of the user whose files are coveted.
        Returns:
        List of all files that meet the criteria:
        Every file must be owned by the specified user.
        Every file must be a child of the specified parent file.

      • getFileParents

        public List<EstherFile> getFileParents(EstherFile file)
        Returns all parent files of the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file whose parent files are coveted.
        Returns:
        The list of all files that list The specified file as their child.

      • setParent

        public void setParent(EstherFile file,
             EstherFile parent)
        Puts two files into a parent-child relationship.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to take the position of the child.
        parent - The file to take the position of the parent.

      • getTotalSize

        public Long getTotalSize(Long ownerId)
        Returns the size of all files owned by the specified user.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - The user whose files' size is to be counted.
        Returns:
        The sum of sizes of all files owned by the specified user.

      • getSystemFileById

        public File getSystemFileById(Long id)
        Returns the file information from the file system.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the coveted file.
        Returns:
        The system file information of the file with the specified ID.
